name: Five Nights at KFP
description:
Hello there. 

I made a Hololive myth game which is adapted from FNAF 1. The full name of the game is Five Nights at KFP. 

The story is about Gawr Gura being trapped in KFP for five nights, and she must avoid being caught by the other EN members to escape KFP successfully.

Credits 

3D Model: Seafoam, Hasksoft 

Program: Modified from ParsecGames Scratch FNAF 1 

Arts: FNAF1 (2014) by Scott Cawthon 

Sounds: FNAF1 (2014) by Scott Cawthon & Hololive EN talents 

Characters: Hololive EN talents

Please go and support Hololive talents & FNAF franchise 

Once again, thanks for playing the game!
